views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11 and 12

Simplify the lockscreen and notification center, based off iOS 9.

Configure options from Settings.

- initial iOS 12 compatibility Been working hard the last month.

- Palette compatibility (banners)
- Colorbanners2 compatibility (banners)
- Separated lockscreen and notification center
- Option to disable Banners
- Option to disable cell separators
- Option to disable notifications
- Option to disable hint text
- Option to hide clock
- Resized blurs
- StackXI compatibility
- Camera bug fixed
- Headers resized
- More efficient updating
- Massive rework for transparent background
- Transparent background works within apps
- Now hides action buttons (iPX)
- Removing useless layers
- Better rotation awareness
- Added cell separator under clock
- Reworked grabber to use system one
- Tint banners based on dominant color
- Completely rewritten blurs
- Reorganization of customization tab
- New saturation option
- New select color option
- 3D touch notification fix
- Other general bug fixes
- Major stability improvements
- Significant changes to efficiency


Depends on libcolorpicker and cephei
Quick fix for bugs. Will add disabling notifications option after further testing. Sorry about that.


Features:
- Banner colors based on icon
- Disable nine banners

Bugs fixed:
- iOS 11.3.1 iPX banner bug resolved
Added Features:
- Remove app icons in banners
- Persistent blur
- Hide grabber bar
- Extend notifications toggle (better support for iPad)

Bugs fixed:
- Underlying blur goes to 0 now
- Removing homescreen wallpaper did not always work
- Landscape NC is no longer a train wreck


Working on the bigger features, just really busy.
